statements: DELETE FROM social_media_interactions WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 AND customer_id = '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111';
DELETE FROM social_media_interactions WHERE message_text LIKE '%complaint%' AND sent_at < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100 AND email = 'test@example.com';
DELETE FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_id = 1 AND sentiment_analysis = 'positive';
DELETE FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 100 AND interaction_type = 'purchase';
DELETE FROM Likes WHERE customer_id = 1 AND post_id = 10;
DELETE FROM Messages WHERE sender_id = 3 AND receiver_id = 5;
